sentences.en: Compared with the ebullient, politically canny Mr Ahmadinejad , the three remaining challengers appeared drab and uninspiring.
sentences.cn: 与热情地, 政治上精明的Ahmadinejad相比, 另外三个竞选人看上去豪无生气,引不起兴趣.

sentences.en: Each expert that attend the meeting was published very cordial and ebullient opinion.
sentences.cn: 与会的各位专家发表了非常诚挚而又热情洋溢的见解.

sentences.en: He extremely nervous and extremely jealous and he covered his nervous jealousy with an ebullient friendliness.
sentences.cn: 他惶恐不安,嫉妒万分,然而,他却摆出热情友善的姿态来掩饰不安的嫉忌心理.

sentences.en: He thinks certainly Manuel sends Yi that, wrote an ebullient acknowledgment letter then.
sentences.cn: 他认为那一定是伊曼纽尔送的, 于是写了一封热情洋溢的感谢信函.

sentences.en: He was ebullient over the reception of his novel.
sentences.cn: 他因小说获好评而兴高采烈.

sentences.en: Here's the lovely, the ebullient Kristin Davis. - Kristin , come in!
sentences.cn: 大家欢迎可爱的 、 热情的克里斯汀?戴维斯. -克里斯汀, 请进来吧!

sentences.en: Home prices , construction and mortgage lending were particularly ebullient in those states earlier this decade.
sentences.cn: 本年代初,这些州的房产开发,房价和房地产抵押贷款特别火热.

sentences.en: She imputed the whole to the extravagance or rather ebullient of his passion.
sentences.cn: 她把这一切全归咎于他情感的丰富,不能自持.

sentences.en: She wrote the ebullient letter when she got back to her flat.
sentences.cn: 她一回到自己的寓所,就写了那封热情洋溢的信.

sentences.en: The family were all in ebullient mood when Peter won the world championship.
sentences.cn: 彼得赢得了世界冠军的称号,全家上下都兴奋无比.

sentences.en: The Prime Minister was in ebullient mood.
True , reality has consistently flattened China forecasters are anything less than ebullient.
sentences.cn: 诚然, 事实一再击败了那些对中国经济增长不够乐观的预测者.

sentences.en: United manager Sir Alex Ferguson was equally ebullient after the deal was announced.
sentences.cn: 曼联经理弗格森爵士在签约消息宣布之后很开心.

words.tran_cn: 奔放；兴高采烈；沸腾；冒泡

trans.tran_cn: 热情奔放的，精力充沛的，沸腾的
trans.tran_en: If you describe someone as ebullient, you mean that they are lively and full of enthusiasm or excitement about something
